column5: Me and sone friends are trying to put together a weekend ice fishing trip on Nippisings south end...we'd like to stay on the water in the huts overnight as well...anybody been?...any reccomendatios or other options would be appreciated...thanks
we go with fish of a lifetime charters , I just started last year but buddies have been doing ther trip for a number of years.
lotsa good operators up there.  One to stay away from is Snofari Adventures.
